name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of hands-on experience in backend system design and delivery, specializing in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), **Postgres**, and **AWS** cloud services. Expert in building and optimizing high-performing APIs, managing relational databases, and implementing infrastructure as code using **CloudFormation**. Proficient in creating responsive data pipelines for **Data Warehousing** and **Data Lakes**, integrating **third-party APIs**, and leveraging **TypeScript** for enhanced application functionality. Recognized for successfully executing impactful projects in dynamic environments, including roles at VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** for engineering backend services with **FastAPI** to enhance document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Employed **relational databases** and specifically **Postgres** to optimize data storage and retrieval processes, ensuring efficiency and reliability.
Implemented infrastructure as code using **Terraform** for deploying microservices seamlessly on **Azure App Services**, managing resources effectively across versions **2.0** and **3.0**.
Developed event-driven solutions leveraging **Celery** and **Redis** to handle asynchronous processing for up to **1,000** concurrent financial transaction requests.
Designed and maintained scalable data pipelines for regulatory data exchange using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring a timely and accurate data flow with a reliability rate of **99.9%**.
Led comprehensive security assessments, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to develop secure, scalable authentication systems, setting a benchmark for compliance in the organization.
Worked collaboratively with cross-functional teams to resolve system integration challenges, guarantee compliance, and manage release strategies efficiently using **TypeScript** methodologies.

• Developed robust backend systems utilizing **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, enhance user onboarding, and streamline complex reporting processes across **9** different projects.
• Engineered and maintained event-driven microservices employing **Celery** and **Redis**, facilitating asynchronous processing of over **500,000** financial transactions and data requests.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation and ensuring consistent and scalable environments across **3** development teams.
• Designed and implemented secure data pipelines for regulatory data exchange using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring automation and optimization of data flow processes resulting in a **30%** increase in efficiency.
• Conducted comprehensive security audits to maintain compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to manage user authentication and secure access controls effectively.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless system integration, maintain regulatory compliance, and achieve successful release management across **5** major software releases.

• Designed and developed robust backend services using **Python** and **PostgreSQL** for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, enhancing trading operations by **30%**.
• Engineered real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, reducing latency to less than **50ms**.
• Collaborated closely with frontend teams to deliver data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket channels**, ensuring smooth user interaction with the platform, contributing to a **15%** increase in user satisfaction ratings.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while implementing internal data security protocols, maintaining a secure data environment.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes and reducing bugs in production by **40%**.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and reducing processing time by **25%**.
• Managed infrastructure as code with **CloudFormation** and **AWS**, ensuring efficient deployment and scalability of backend services, enhancing system reliability.
